text: Bevan Fransman (born 31 October 1983 in Cape Town, Western Cape) is a South African footballer, currently playing as a centre back for Highlands Park. He was in the South Africa squad for the 2008 African Nations Cup. ==Career== ===Hapoel Tel Aviv=== On 9 June 2010 Fransman completed the transfer to Israeli double holders for an undisclosed fee signing a 3-year contract. ==Honours== *Israel State Cup (2): **2011, 2012 ==External links== * Category:1983 births Category:South African soccer players Category:South Africa international soccer players Category:South African expatriate soccer players Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Cape Town Category:Association football central defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:Western Province United F.C. players Category:Kaizer Chiefs F.C. players Category:Moroka Swallows F.C. players Category:Royal Excel Mouscron players Category:Maccabi Netanya F.C. players Category:Bloemfontein Celtic F.C. players Category:Hapoel Tel Aviv F.C. players Category:SuperSport United F.C. players Category:Highlands Park F.C. players Category:Maritzburg United F.C. players Category:Israeli Premier League players Category:South African Premier Division players Category:Cape Coloureds Category:2008 Africa Cup of Nations players Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:South African expatriate sportspeople in Israel
title: Bevan Fransman
